testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that email type supported on input element

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that multiple attribute supported for input element type attribute is in the E-mail state

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that user agents should allow the user to set the value to the empty string when the multiple attribute is not specified on the element

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that user agents must not allow users to insert LF character into the value when the multiple attribute is not specified on the element

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that user agents must not allow users to insert CR character into the value when the multiple attribute is not specified on the element

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that the value attribute must have a value that is a single valid e-mail address if specified and not empty

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that the element values are the result of splitting on commas the element value when the multiple attribute is specified on the element

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that the user agent must run the value sanitization algorithm when the multiple attribute is removed and the multiple attribute is NOT specified on the element

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that user agents must not allow users to set any individual value to a string containing commas when the multiple attribute is specified on the element

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that user agents must not allow users to set any individual value to a string containing LF characters when the multiple attribute is specified on the element

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that user agents must not allow users to set any individual value to a string containing CR characters when the multiple attribute is specified on the element

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that the user agent must let latest values be a copy of the element values whenever the user changes the element values

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that the user agent must strip leading and trailing whitespace from each value in latest values whenever the user changes the element values

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that the user agent must let the element value be the result of concatenating all the values in latest values, separating each value from the next by a single commas character, maintaining the list order

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that the user agent must run the value sanitization algorithm when the multiple attribute is set 1

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that the user agent must run the value sanitization algorithm when the multiple attribute is set 2

testcase.purpose: Test checks that user agents must not allow users to insert LF character into the value

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that user agents must not allow users to insert CR character into the value

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that the value attribute must have a value that contains no LF characters if specified

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/HTML5 telephone, email and URL state of input element
testcase.purpose: Test checks that the value attribute must have a value that contains no CR characters if specified

testcase.purpose: Test checks that the value sanitization algorithm is as follows: Strip line breaks from the value
